summary: Diff implements a new cohesive romantic theme (palette, gradients, glassmorphism, floating hearts) across Landing/Videos/Final pages and updates the Videos page header to “Featured Videos” with a responsive 1-column → 3-column grid. However, it also adds several unrequested artifacts/features (step navigation UI, remote video save architecture/spec/demo, and a noted caffeine.ai attribution footer in the file summary).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a step-based navigation component (Back/Next + step pills) that is not requested by REQ-36/37/38.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires responsive navigation between pages, not a new stepper UI component.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded a remote video save architecture and documentation, including a detailed spec markdown and a standalone demo HTML page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly include not adding new backend persistence APIs or changing data models for this request; these additions go beyond styling/polish of the featured videos section and mirroring a reference design.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/mentioned a fixed footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requests adding attribution or a new fixed footer element as part of mirroring the reference styling or polishing the featured videos section.

BuildRequest forbids introducing new third-party libraries outside the existing stack; adding a new Tailwind plugin may constitute an unrequested dependency change (cannot confirm installation from diff summary alone).
